data.quote: People aren't born ordinary but they choose to be ordinary
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Great dreams of great dreamers are always transcended
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: If you don't build your dream, someone else will hire you to help them build theirs.
data.author: Dhirubhai Ambani

data.quote: Our dreams have to be bigger. Our ambitions higher. Our commitment deeper. And our efforts greater.
data.author: Dhirubhai Ambani

data.quote: Do or do not. There is no try.
data.author: Yoda

data.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
data.author: Amelia Earhart

data.quote: What’s money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
data.author: Bob Dylan

data.quote: Certain things catch your eye, but pursue only those that capture the heart.
data.author: Ancient Indian Proverb

data.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you’ll always have more. If you look at what you don’t have in life, you’ll never have enough.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
data.author: Steven Covey

data.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
data.author: Will Rogers

data.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: To see what is right and not do it is a lack of courage.
data.author: Confucious

data.quote: Today’s accomplishments were yesterday’s impossibilities.
data.author: Robert H. Schuller

data.quote: There are no limits to what you can accomplish, except the limits you place on your own thinking.
data.author: Brian Tracy

data.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: Don’t limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.
data.author: Babe Ruth

data.quote: If people are doubting how far you can go, go so far that you can’t hear them anymore.
data.author: Michele Ruiz

data.quote: We need to accept that we won’t always make the right decisions, that we’ll screw up royally sometimes – understanding that failure is not the opposite of success, it’s part of success.
data.author: Arianna Huffington

data.quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: Smart people learn from everything and everyone, average people from their experiences, stupid people already have all the answers.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
data.author: Dalai Lama XIV

data.quote: If we have the attitude that it’s going to be a great day it usually is.
data.author: Catherine Pulsifier

data.quote: You can either experience the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The choice is yours.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Impossible is just an opinion.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: Your passion is waiting for your courage to catch up.
data.author: Isabelle Lafleche

data.quote: Magic is believing in yourself. If you can make that happen, you can make anything happen.
data.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

data.quote: If something is important enough, even if the odds are stacked against you, you should still do it.
data.author: Elon Musk

data.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
data.author: John D. Rockefeller

data.quote: No one is to blame for your future situation but yourself. If you want to be successful, then become “Successful.”
data.author: Jaymin Shah

data.quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
data.author: Anne Frank

data.quote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
data.author: Michael Jordan
